javadoc: A class to represent the IMAGE_LOAD_CONFIG_DIRECTORY data structure which is defined in winnt.h.

methods.javadoc: DO NOT USE THIS CONSTRUCTOR, USE create*(GenericFactory ...) FACTORY METHODS INSTEAD.
methods.name: <init>
methods.comment: DO NOT USE THIS CONSTRUCTOR, USE create*(GenericFactory ...) FACTORY METHODS INSTEAD.

methods.javadoc:
Returns the size (in bytes) of this structure.
@return the size (in bytes) of this structure
methods.name: getSize
methods.comment: Returns the size (in bytes) of this structure.

return.comment: the size (in bytes) of this structure

methods.javadoc:
Returns the critical section default time-out value.
@return the critical section default time-out value
methods.name: getCriticalSectionDefaultTimeout
methods.comment: Returns the critical section default time-out value.

return.comment: the critical section default time-out value

methods.javadoc:
Gets the safe exception handler table.
@return the safe exception handler table.
methods.name: getSeHandlerTable
methods.comment: Gets the safe exception handler table.

methods.javadoc:
Gets the safe exception handler table count.
@return the safe exception handler table count.
methods.name: getSeHandlerCount
methods.comment: Gets the safe exception handler table count.

return.comment: the safe exception handler table count.

methods.javadoc:
Gets the ControlFlowGuard {@link GuardFlags}.
@return The ControlFlowGuard {@link GuardFlags}.
methods.name: getCfgGuardFlags
getCfgCheckFunctionPointer
methods.comment: Gets the ControlFlowGuard check function pointer address.

return.comment:
The ControlFlowGuard check function pointer address.  
   Could be 0 if ControlFlowGuard is not being used.

methods.name: getCfgDispatchFunctionPointer
methods.comment: Gets the ControlFlowGuard dispatch function pointer address.

return.comment:
The ControlFlowGuard dispatch function pointer address.  
   Could be 0 if ControlFlowGuard is not being used.

methods.name: getCfgFunctionTablePointer
methods.comment: Gets the ControlFlowGuard function table pointer address.

return.comment:
The ControlFlowGuard function table function pointer address.  
   Could be 0 if ControlFlowGuard is not being used.

methods.name: getCfgFunctionCount

return.comment:
The ControlFlowGuard function count.  Could be 0 if ControlFlowGuard is 
   not being used.

methods.name: getRfgFailureRoutine
methods.comment: Gets the ReturnFlowGuard failure routine address.

return.comment:
The ReturnFlowGuard failure routine address.
   Could be 0 if ReturnFlowGuard is not being used.

methods.name: getRfgFailureRoutineFunctionPointer
methods.comment: Gets the ReturnFlowGuard failure routine function pointer address.

return.comment:
The ReturnFlowGuard failure routine function pointer address.
   Could be 0 if ReturnFlowGuard is not being used.

methods.name: getRfgVerifyStackPointerFunctionPointer
methods.comment: Gets the ReturnFlowGuard verify stack pointer function pointer address.

return.comment:
The ReturnFlowGuard verify stack pointer function pointer address.
   Could be 0 if ReturnFlowGuard is not being used.

name: LoadConfigDirectory
comment:
A class to represent the IMAGE_LOAD_CONFIG_DIRECTORY
 data structure which is defined in winnt.h.
